CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Status, "New") , IF( Work_Order__r.WorkType.Name = "Stray" && Work_Order__r.Conference__r.Company__r.Name = "US Duty" , PPS_Sort_Key__c & " - Straybell MON - " & AppointmentNumber , PPS_Sort_Key__c & " - " & AppointmentNumber ) , Role_ID__c )
CustomField.label: RoleId
